68b5('bum): gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/ mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus// bcom
68b6('bum): ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/
68b7('bum): gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das don go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg
68b8('bum): rgyabaco ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to/
69a1('bum): pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha
69a2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya/
69a3('bum): gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi tse zhig gi don tu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin
69a4('bum): pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi ce'i don tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
69a5('bum): byin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi ce'i don tu bzod
69a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa bsgom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i
69a7('bum): don tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus rlom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brjon 'grus
69b1('bum): rtsom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i don tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
69b2('bum): pa la spyod cing bsam gtan bskyed do// sems can nyung zad nyi ci'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu shes rab
69b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya
69b4('bum): ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi bya'o zhes sam/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod bar bya'o// sems 'di snyed cig ni byang chub
69b5('bum): tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don tu go cha chen po gyon to// de 'di snyam du sems
69b6('bum): te bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
69b7('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyang bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems
70a1('bum): can thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad
70a2('bum): kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
70a3('bum): phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang /
70a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams na
70a5('bum): kyang phyi stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang stong /
70a6('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad
70a7('bum): kyang chen po stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis
70b1('bum): kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
70b2('bum): par bya'o// sems cad thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams/
70b3('bum): cad kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma
70b4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag
70b5('bum): gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzog
70b6('bum): par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang
70b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o//
71a1('bum): bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang
71a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid// yongs su
71a3('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can tham
71a4('bum): cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyar bar
71a5('bum): bya'o// bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o//
71a6('bum): sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang byang chub
71a7('bum): kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o//
71b1('bum): sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i
71b2('bum): bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang bsam gtan rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang chad med pa rnams la gnas
71b3('bum): bar bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshad med pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs
71b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnams par thar pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang
71b5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par mthar pa'i
71b6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag
71b7('bum): kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems
72a1('bum): can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo
72a2('bum): rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang
72a3('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad
72a4('bum): kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang snying rje chen po la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi
72a5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
72a6('bum): ti'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
72a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
72b1('bum): yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ba ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sem
72b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
72b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don tu yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni/
72b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
72b5('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni/ byang
72b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
72b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems
73a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
73a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing /
73a3('bum): de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
73a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
73a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas
73a6('bum): te/ des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin
73a7('bum): pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
73b1('bum): bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa de dag mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes
73b2('bum): par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
73b3('bum): yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su
73b4('bum): sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
73b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang
73b6('bum): mos pa mi bskyed na so so'i sgra lta smos kyang mi smos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// /
73b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
74a1('bum): cing chos de dag la bzod pa dang thos pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
74a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing //
74a3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan
74a4('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i
74a5('bum): che nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi glo mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo
74a6('bum): ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
74a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
74b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs
74b2('bum): shing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
74b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de
74b4('bum): ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
74b5('bum): chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin
74b6('bum): pa yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sem/
74b7('bum): dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
75a1('bum): pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha
75a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
75a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
75a4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag la bzod pa dang rten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod ka'i 'aros du phyin pas
75a5('bum): yod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam
75a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod
75a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
75b1('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
75b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs
75b3('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byas pas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i
75b4('bum): 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi spyod pa'i shes
75b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad
75b6('bum): yongs su 'dzin te/ de ni go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
75b7('bum): cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
76a1('bum): de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
76a2('bum): chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
76a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de
76a4('bum): yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims
76a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
76a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag de ltar bzod pa dang mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
76a7('bum): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang
76b1('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don
76b2('bum): tu brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing brtun mi ngas pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
76b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
76b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos
76b5('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/
76b6('bum): brtson 'grus rtsom pa des rlom sems su mi byed do// brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
76b7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
77a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
77a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad
77a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
77a4('bum): su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
77a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
77a6('bum): yid la bya bas tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ bsam
77a7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
77b1('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa yongs su bsgom ste/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos/
77b2('bum): shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
77b3('bum): pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnams pa
77b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
77b5('bum): byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
77b6('bum): dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig
77b7('bum): byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi ge mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ dran
78a1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
78a2('bum): ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des
78a3('bum): kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing bsam gtan yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
78a4('bum): yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi
78a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
78a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
78a7('bum): yid la bya bas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
78b1('bum): chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
78b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
78b3('bum): yid la byas pas tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di
78b4('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
78b5('bum): pa spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos
78b6('bum): shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
78b7('bum): spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang
79a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
79a2('bum): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
79a3('bum): phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu pA la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
79a4('bum): ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag
79a5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
79a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin
79a7('bum): gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
79b1('bum): byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam
79b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang byang chub la mtshan mAR+Ya mi dmigs pa 'di
79b3('bum): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
79b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
79b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang
79b6('bum): myong bar mi byed do// bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang mtshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms
79b7('bum): par 'jug pa'i dbang gyis kyang mi skye'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang 'gros
79b8('bum): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la bden pa mthong
80a1('bum): ba dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par 'jog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi
80a2('bum): byed de/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
80a3('bum): la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//
80a4('bum): bam po lnga// / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
80a5('bum): de ltar go cha bgos pa la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs
80a6('bum): su sgrog pa mdzad te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go che chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs
80a7('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
80b1('bum): dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa'
80b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par mdzad/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phral gyis rnam par rje'o zhes smra
80b3('bum): brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa
80b4('bum): ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su
80b5('bum): smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o// zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
80b6('bum): khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi
80b7('bum): khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po 'gos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag lnga
81a1('bum): byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed
81a2('bum): dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems
81a3('bum): dpa' chen po go cha chen po 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyang
81a4('bum): rjes su sgrog go// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing
81a5('bum): ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhag na byang chub sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi
81a6('bum): zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
81a7('bum): ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod ni ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sem
81b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o/
81b2('bum): zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams
81b3('bum): kyang ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen glo cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs
81b4('bum): su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
81b5('bum): khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams
81b6('bum): che dge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//
81b7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi byed ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
82a1('bum): 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
82a2('bum): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig/ sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdul 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing
82a3('bum): dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par bzhugs pa zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa'
82a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha
82a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang
82a6('bum): po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa
82a7('bum): med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin
82b1('bum): du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnams par spyod pa gtang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod de/ dga' ba med pI/
82b2('bum): bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spang shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med
82b3('bum): sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po// shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis
82b4('bum): po tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs 'i
82b5('bum): phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa ltod
82b6('bum): pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam
82b7('bum): par spyod do// dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po// shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ stod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu
83a1('bum): bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ rnam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang te/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmisnas
83a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgom
83a3('bum): pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha' mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes
83a4('bum): las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te nam mkha' yas skye mched la
83a5('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye
83a6('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zang ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched pa
83a7('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te banas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rung bad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med mni skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i chul gyis
83b1('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dad chad med
83b2('bum): pa 'di dag dang gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas rnam par 'jug cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
83b3('bum): yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ 'dod pas dben sdig tom
83b4('bum): dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par
83b5('bum): rtogs pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga'
83b6('bum): ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde
83b7('bum): ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar
84a1('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang sdug bsngal yang med/
84a2('bum): pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa/ gcugs
84a3('bum): med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par
84a4('bum): bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa
84a5('bum): med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas
84a6('bum): shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa/
84a7('bum): shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs
84b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gzugs med pa gnod pa med pa ltod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu
84b2('bum): bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa
84b3('bum): thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha'
84b4('bum): mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnams pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang
84b5('bum): dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas
84b6('bum): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye
84b7('bum): mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sem
85a1('bum): dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na/
85a2('bum): yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe/ yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni
85a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos
85a4('bum): kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam
85a5('bum): pa thams cad du rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i ting
85a6('bum): nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral te dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin dang btang
85a7('bum): snyoms su gnas te/ bde lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam
85b1('bum): gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang
85b2('bum): med pa btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang bu'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med
85b3('bum): pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos
85b4('bum): par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa stod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/
85b5('bum): shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang
85b6('bum): ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa ltod pa med yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
85b7('bum): kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems
86a1('bum): rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa stod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
86a2('bum): kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par
86a3('bum): 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so// zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye
86a4('bum): bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas
86a5('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad me longs skye mched la nye bar gnas so//
86a6('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
86a7('bum): 'dini byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan pa'i bsam gtan kye rgyas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bas pa gtan 'di das dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / bcas
86b1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul drong mtshan mas ma nyams par 'jog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo
86b2('bum): ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos
86b3('bum): kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa
86b4('bum): dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga'
86b5('bum): ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis par bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba
86b6('bum): lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs
86b7('bum): te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde bsnga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran
87a1('bum): / bas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa
87a2('bum): med pa lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par
87a3('bum): byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs
87a4('bum): pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba
87a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig
87a6('bum): rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms
87a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po// shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos
87b1('bum): kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang
87b2('bum): dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'dus shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de
87b3('bum): zhes nam 'a mdza'
87b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam
87b5('bum): pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams
87b6('bum): cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang
87b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / chad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na
87b8('bum): yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas rnam par 'jog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sem
88a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis
88a2('bum): dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa
88a3('bum): rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa
88a4('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms
88a5('bum): su gnas te/ de bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam
88a6('bum): gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med
88a7('bum): sdug bsngal yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi
88b1('bum): gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtum
88b2('bum): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa
88b3('bum): gnod pa med pa ltod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shing tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par
88b4('bum): bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa mtshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa
88b5('bum): med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam pa
88b6('bum): spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa stod pa med pa
88b7('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam
89a1('bum): par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du
89a2('bum): shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha'
89a3('bum): mthas yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams
89a4('bum): cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du
89a5('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub
89a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na
89a7('bum): yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/
89b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig tom dge ba'i chos kyis
89b2('bum): dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam
89b3('bum): par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang
89b4('bum): bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/
89b5('bum): bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum
89b6('bum): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs te yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang
89b7('bum): med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po// shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa tshad med
90a1('bum): pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa stod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs
90a2('bum): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa
90a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de
90a4('bum): dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig
90a5('bum): rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyom
90a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/
90a7('bum): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs
90b1('bum): kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam
90b2('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so
90b3('bum): zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes
90b4('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min
90b5('bum): skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
90b6('bum): chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'od dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par
90b7('bum): ldang ba'i tshe/ yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
91a1('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
91a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i seMs rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa
91a3('bum): shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan
91a4('bum): pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongasasu rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
91a5('bum): pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa
91a6('bum): tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa ltod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyog
91a7('bum): bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par sprod do// de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa
91b1('bum): med pa ltod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos
91b2('bum): par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de 'dod pas dben sdig to ma dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtogs pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde
91b3('bum): ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtogs pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas
91b4('bum): rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod
91b5('bum): chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan la bde ba la rnam par
91b6('bum): spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spang shing yid
91b7('bum): bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs/
92a1('bum): te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes
92a2('bum): yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas
92a3('bum): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes
92a4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung
92a5('bum): zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sem
92a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon tu 'gro bas
92a7('bum): nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang / ston cing
92b1('bum): 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
92b2('bum): chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis bsam
92b3('bum): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas kyang
92b4('bum): rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o// de ltar byang
92b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
92b6('bum): 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam du sems shing / yid la bya
92b7('bum): ba de dag la bzod pa dang mos po dang / rtog pa dang sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
93a1('bum): / nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa
93a2('bum): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson
93a3('bum): 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
93a4('bum): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam
93a5('bum): par 'jog cing rnam par ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol
93a6('bum): tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang /
93a7('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gsum pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / byams pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang
93b1('bum): btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de dag
93b2('bum): mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam
93b3('bum): rab tu rtog kyang bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
93b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
93b5('bum): pa'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa
93b6('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du dbang po lnga bsgom
93b7('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lta bsgoms pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
94a1('bum): pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgoms pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam
94a2('bum): pa thams cad du tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad nga rnam par thar pa
94a3('bum): rnams skam pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam
94a4('bum): pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa dang /
94a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgoms pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
94a6('bum): rnams bsgoms pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
94a7('bum): du byams pa chen po bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam
94b1('bum): pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
94b2('bum): bsgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
94b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o// zhes de la gzhol bar byed do// snying
94b4('bum): rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang snying rtse ba'i nyams su byed do// dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing / bdag gi
94b5('bum): kyang dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so// btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing sems can rnams kyi zag pa bzod par bya ba la rab
94b6('bum): tu gzhol bar byed do// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
94b7('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan ma la mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sngo ba ma
95a1('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/
95a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
95a3('bum): pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi bskyed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos
95a4('bum): shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa/
95a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don tu/ brtson 'grus mi
95a6('bum): gtongs pas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub
95a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / chad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i sgoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang /
95b1('bum): zad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gyis mi skye zhing / de dag gir myong bar byed pa yang med la de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/
95b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
95b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par
95b4('bum): ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i
95b5('bum): rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
95b6('bum): po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
95b7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi
96a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid
96a2('bum): shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
96a3('bum): ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ thog ma
96a4('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang
96a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mi
96a6('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
96a7('bum): nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
96b1('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
96b2('bum): ni dA chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
96b3('bum): po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag
96b4('bum): ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug
96b5('bum): bdag med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni mi dmig
96b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
96b7('bum): theg pa chen po ni/ 'das pa'i dus su shes pa 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus su shes pa 'jug pa dang / da ltar byang ba'i dus su shes pa 'jug pa med de/ dus gsu
97a1('bum): du shes pa med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
97a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jugs par mi byed la/
97a3('bum): 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'
97a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thag pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams
97a5('bum): la'ang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams
97a6('bum): la shes pa mi 'jug kyang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma
97a7('bum): byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//
97b1('bum): smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sem
97b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang nges sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
97b3('bum): tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
97b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
97b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul
97b6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
97b7('bum): dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
98a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bzod pa'ang mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha
98a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
98a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
98a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang
98a5('bum): chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha
