98a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam
98a7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigra/
98b1('bum): yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o//
98b2('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des
98b3('bum): dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi dge ba dang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos
98b4('bum): kyang mi dmigs shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
98b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
98b6('bum): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgoms pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam
98b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmags pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad
99a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam
99a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad
99a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
99a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
99a5('bum): la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
99a6('bum): pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don te de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa
99a7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
99b1('bum): par bsgom pa'i don te de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par
99b2('bum): bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
99b3('bum): pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi
99b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i
99b5('bum): tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
99b6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo lta
99b7('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
100a1('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma
100a2('bum): 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
100a3('bum): par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par
100a4('bum): bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i
100a5('bum): don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i
100a6('bum): tshul gyis snyoms lnga bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgos pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi phan
100a7('bum): lag bdun bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad/
100b1('bum): pa bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom mo//
100b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
100b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
100b4('bum): yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
100b5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
100b6('bum): bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
100b7('bum): la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
101a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa smra bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i/
101a2('bum): dze par
101a3('bum): yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
101a4('bum): pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa
101a5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
101a6('bum): par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i
101a7('bum): don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma madres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don
101a8('bum): tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de ma dmigs
101b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas/
101b2('bum): pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sem
101b3('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'du shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'du shes
101b4('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'du byed dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba
101b5('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir mig ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sna dmigs su med
101b6('bum): pa'i phyir sna zhes bya ba 'di ming tsam du zad do// lce dmigs su med pa'i phyir lce zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lus dmigs su med pa'i phyir lus zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
101b7('bum): yid sdigs su med pa'i phyir yid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang // gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sgra dang gis su med pa'i phyir sgra zhes
102a1('bum): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dri dmigs su med pa'i phyir dri zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ro dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
102a2('bum): tsam du zad do// reg dmigs su med pa'i phyir reg ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos zhes bya ba 'di ni ming du zad do// mig gi rnam par shes
102a3('bum): pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di
102a4('bum): ni mang tsam du zad do// sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir sna'i rnam parA zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir lce'i rnam
102a5('bum): par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yid kyi rnam pa
102a6('bum): shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa
102a7('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa
102b1('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming du zad do// /
102b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus
102b3('bum): reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni
102b4('bum): mang tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sna'i
102b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
102b6('bum): tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su
102b7('bum): med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
103a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sa'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
103a2('bum): tsam du zad do// chu'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chu'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// me'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ me'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad
103a3('bum): do/ rlung gi khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rlung gi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zad do// nam mkha'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'i khams zhes bya
103a4('bum): ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ma rig pa dmigs su med
103a5('bum): ba'i phyir/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'du byed dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i
103a6('bum): phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming du zad do// ming dang gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// skye mched drug dmigs
103a7('bum): med pa'i phyir skyed mched drug ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir tshor ba
103b1('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sred pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir sred pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// len pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir len pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
103b2('bum): du zad do// srid pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir srid pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rga shi dmigs
103b3('bum): su med pa'i phyir rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
103b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
103b5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
103b6('bum): tsam du zad do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmag
103b7('bum): su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du
104a1('bum): zad do// phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i
104a2('bum): phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
104a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir don dam pa stong
104a4('bum): pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'dus ma
104a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming nam du zad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mtha' las
104a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmags su med pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming
104a7('bum): tsam du zad do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir
104b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
104b2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
104b3('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
104b4('bum): du zad do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i
104b5('bum): phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyi n+d+he sna bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni
104b6('bum): ming tsam du zad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su/
104b7('bum): med pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dbang po rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir dbang po lnga zhes bya ba 'doni ming cam du zad do// stobs rnam
105a1('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ stobs lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
105a2('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
105a3('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// bsam gtan rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni
105a4('bum): ming tsam du zad do// tshad med pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med
105a5('bum): pa'i phyir/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par thar pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di
105a6('bum): ni ming tsam du zad do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
105a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa zhes bya ba
105b1('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med
105b2('bum): pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// de bzhin gshegs
105b3('bum): pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mi 'jigs pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi 'jig
105b4('bum): pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// snying
105b5('bum): rje chen po dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
105b6('bum): ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
105b7('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming cam du zad do// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
106a1('bum): nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming cam du zad do// chos kyi dbyings dmigs su
106a2('bum): med pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba 'di ni mi tsam du zad do// chos kyi gnas nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos kyi gnas nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos
106a3('bum): skyon med pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos skyon med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ ming tsam du zad do// yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
106a4('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming cam du zad do// sangs rgyam dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
106a5('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming cam du zad do zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yang dag par gnas
106a6('bum): shes bya'o// bam po drug pa'o// / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
106a7('bum): dnga' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa ras nye bar 'thung ste snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/ mngon par shes pa mas cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing sen
106b1('bum): can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang rim 'gro bya ba'i tshul gang dang gang las 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
106b2('bum): rnams la rim gro bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
106b3('bum): 'das de dag la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de byang chub sems dpa' theg pa de la gnas te sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro
106b4('bum): zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung sems can gyi 'du shes
106b5('bum): kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing lus ci lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus
106b6('bum): ched du bsams shing / yongs su 'dzin to// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur kyi bar du theg pa de dang nam du yang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thaH
106b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
107a1('bum): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de bla na med pa
107a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom
107a3('bum): ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon gtan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thatheg pa chen po bla na med pa'i
107a4('bum): theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar
107a5('bum): byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
107a6('bum): pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khas che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog
107a7('bum): la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do// zhes grags
107b1('bum): ba sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod
107b2('bum): pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig
107b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//
107b4('bum): byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi kham che ge mo
107b5('bum): zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas
107b6('bum): kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
107b7('bum): naHsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po tha
108a1('bum): na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang /
108a2('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs
108a3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa chen
108a4('bum): po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo
108a5('bum): skor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom
108a6('bum): ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i
108a7('bum): theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed//
108b1('bum): zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhug
108b2('bum): pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas/
108b3('bum): pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing
108b4('bum): dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma byed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing
108b5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams
108b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// steng gi phyogs kyi
108b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub
109a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
109a2('bum): ste / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// de ltar na tshe dang ldan
109a3('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das
109a4('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems
109a5('bum): dpa' chen po go cha chen po go chen po bgos pa zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal/
109a6('bum): to/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i go cha chen po gyon cing 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/
109a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos bsam gtan gyi pha
109b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i go cha 'gos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha 'gos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go/
109b2('bum): cha bgos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/
109b3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dor ba med pa stong/
109b4('bum): pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mi dmigs pa
109b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa stong nyid kyi go cha 'gos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dran
109b6('bum): bA nye bar bzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos/ dbang po'i go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ byang chub
109b7('bum): kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos/ lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi go cha bgos/ tshad med pa'i go cha bgos/ gzugs
110a1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar
110a2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos/ ting nge 'dzin kyi go cha bgos/ gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos/
110a3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag rig pa'i go cha bgos/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
110a4('bum): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skad
110a5('bum): bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi
110a6('bum): bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
110a7('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so//
110b1('bum): shar lce'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho nub kyi phyogs marnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung /
110b2('bum): gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten
110b3('bum): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// stong
110b4('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam par drug tu rab tu bskyod de/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do//
110b5('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi byed ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod
110b6('bum): do dbyang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gir klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
110b7('bum): snyed rnam chug tu rab tu bskyod do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams
111a1('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi kham gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma/
111a2('bum): snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
111a3('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can myal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
111a4('bum): cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmya
111a5('bum): ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba de sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems
111a6('bum): can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des stong/
111a7('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas/
111b1('bum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems
111b2('bum): can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi
111b3('bum): skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsum gyi
111b4('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/
111b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sem
111b6('bum): can de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dga' ba dang bde ba des gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag gshin rje'i 'jig
111b7('bum): rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar phyogs kyi 'jig
112a1('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po chen po ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
112a2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra
112a3('bum): de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas
112a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye sa
112a5('bum): snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed yod pa dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs// dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal
112a6('bum): lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde
112a7('bum): ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
112b1('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
112b2('bum): thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems
112b3('bum): can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo //
112b4('bum): de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu
112b5('bum): skye'o// des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin
112b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas
112b7('bum): kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das
113a1('bum): / bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang shar phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems
113a2('bum): can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po chen po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag
113a3('bum): 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag
113a4('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs
113a5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhags shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems
113a6('bum): can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
113a7('bum): lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnams
113a8('bum): papal ba'i sems can
113b1('bum): par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de
113b2('bum): dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
113b3('bum): thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go//
113b4('bum): de'i tshe sems cad dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag
113b5('bum): nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des nub byang gi phyogs mtsham
113b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
113b7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang spangs
114a1('bum): rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal
114a2('bum): ba de dag rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag tu skye'o// des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig
114a3('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cing yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
114a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs kyi sgra de thos nas
114a5('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba de des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par lang
114a6('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhang gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des steng gi
114a7('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin

114b3('bum): dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar
114b4('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jigs rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams

114b6('bum): tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba
114b7('bum): dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byal sang ga skye gnas dang gshan rje'i 'jig rten da dag nas

115a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin

115a6('bum): rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol sol gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang nas sangs

116a7('bum): byol song gi skye gnas dang gzhin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam yar ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par yangs nas/ sangs rgyas
116b1('bum): kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag tu skye'o// des shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma

116b5('bum): song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnams par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs
116b6('bum): rgyas kyi zhing gang rung gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dad de dag tu skye'o// des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
116b7('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byol song gi skye gnas dang sha ni rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi bsdug bsngal
117a1('bum): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
117a2('bum): bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba

117b1('bum): can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang 'jig rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo //

117b4('bum): can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cing yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
117b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal po bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag
117b6('bum): kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de
117b7('bum): dag byol song gi skye gnas dag shin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing
118a1('bum): 'tshe skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i
118a2('bum): 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin
118a3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten
118a4('bum): du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de
118a5('bum): dag gnas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
118a6('bum): 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag tu skye'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po
118a7('bum): che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul la/
118b1('bum): ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog/ chos kyi sgra sgrog/ dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par 'gyur la/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas
118b2('bum): kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab
118b3('bum): 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
118b4('bum): 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sem
118b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum yang bkrol yang / sems can gang yang yongs su grol ba
118b6('bum): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
118b7('bum): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
119a1('bum): @gnas shing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul
119a2('bum): nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do//
119a3('bum): skom 'dod pa rnams la skom gyi sbyin pa byed do// bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa'i sbyin pa byed do// gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kyi sbyin pa byed do// me tog 'dod pa rnams la
119a4('bum): me tog gi sbyin pa byed do// 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la 'phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed do// spos 'dod pa rnams la spos kyi sbyin pa byed do// byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa'i sbyin pa
119a5('bum): byed do/ ta mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal tsha'i sbyin pa byed do// khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyi sbyin pa byed do// 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed do// yo byad
119a6('bum): 'dod pa rnams lU yo byed do// nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel
119a7('bum): dang / bye ru dang / gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang dngul gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/
119b1('bum): mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed do// des de ltar zas 'dod pa la zas byin/ skom 'dod pa la skom byin/ gos 'dod pa la gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa la me
119b2('bum): tog byin/ 'greng ba 'dod pa la 'phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa la spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa la mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa la khyim byin/ 'tshob
119b3('bum): 'dod pa la 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa la yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man
119b4('bum): shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang dngul 'dod pa la/ nor bu dang mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang / gser dang dngul byin pa nas/ mo'i yo byad gang cing yang
119b5('bum): rung ba'i bar du byin pa nas sems can de dag la 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can de dag gis kyang chos
119b6('bum): bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyin pa drug dang nam du yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper dabla ma ma mas
119b7('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod
120a1('bum): pa rnams la ni zas byin skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog
120a2('bum): 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ 'bring ba 'dod rnams la ni 'breng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod
120a3('bum): pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang
120a4('bum): yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang
120a5('bum): mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dang dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad dang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i
120a6('bum): mkhan po 'am/ sgyu mi'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
120a7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni
120b1('bum): byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/
120b2('bum): 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim
120b3('bum): 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen gyi
120b4('bum): dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung
120b5('bum): dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang gser dang dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
120b6('bum): rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go
120b7('bum): cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing ched du bsam te/ skye
121a1('bum): ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing / de 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas sems can rnams dge ba
121a2('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
121a3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
121a4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
121a5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs
121a6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
121a7('bum): brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god do// sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur kyi bar du
121b1('bum): chos bstan pa de dag dang nam yang 'gral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam
121b2('bum): po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod
121b3('bum): dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi
121b4('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
121b5('bum): brgyad pa dang / rnam par pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
121b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so sa
121b7('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
122a1('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ khams gtan
122a2('bum): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
122a3('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
122a4('bum): ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
122a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
122a6('bum): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sem
122a7('bum): dpa' chen pos sems can chad med grangs med pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / chad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
122b1('bum): pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang
122b2('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
122b3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
122b4('bum): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bkod kyang sems can gang yang de
122b5('bum): dag la bkod pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub
122b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
122b7('bum): sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor shing rab tu 'gong ngo // rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
123a1('bum): la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
123a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad la rdo dang / dbyig pas rdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag gis
123a3('bum): 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o zhes go cha bgos par byed cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god par byed do// rab
123a4('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi
123a5('bum): mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar ba dang rab tu bkod pa byas na/ rab 'byor de la 'di snyam du sems//
123a6('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom
123a7('bum): ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can cad
123b1('bum): med grangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / ses ca ga sa sa phyin pas mtho pa medag nabu 'phying sheg rab 'byor de bya
123b2('bum): chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
123b3('bum): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul pa dang gzhog cing 'god do// rab
123b4('bum): 'byor ji ltar nad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
123b5('bum): bar skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems brtsed
123b6('bum): mas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/
123b7('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par skul te/ lus dang sems kyi 'artson 'grus
123b8('bum): skye bo mang po ni chos kyi mnan
124a1('bum): bkod na/ rab 'byor de la 'di snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang lus sems kyi brjon
124a2('bum): 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
124a3('bum): dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do// de
124a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid de nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
124a5('bum): chen po na go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can tham
124a6('bum): cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi
124a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skal ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
124b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing / chos gang yang 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
124b2('bum): phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing bzhog pa dang / 'god pa byed de/ de ltar yang dag
124b3('bum): par skal ba rnams kyang / nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur kyi bar tu nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi
124b4('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi
124b5('bum): mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i
124b6('bum): mtshan bu des/ sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
124b7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang
125a1('bum): yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin
125a2('bum): pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
125a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu pA la yang dag par skal zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
125a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab
125a5('bum): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang
125a6('bum): ba 'am/ tshu rol lam/ pha rol lam/ pha rol tu mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin
125a7('bum): du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skal zhing gzhon
125b1('bum): skye bo ma gan rdzun gyi macan du/
125b2('bum): go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i gzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon
125b3('bum): par sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul te bzhag cing rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des
125b4('bum): sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin
125b5('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod cing / sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
125b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
125b7('bum): po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
125b8('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
126a1('bum): mang sbyin pa'i rab tu phyin pa la yang dag pa nga/ gnagan/ 'ashad do// dkar bdag byung ga rgya gzisas kyi la tu
126a2('bum): de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'dod
126a3('bum): do// ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji skyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bzod pa'i pharom
126a4('bum): byin pa la yang dag par yul shing gzhon so/ 'god do// ji skar bdag brtso 'bras kyi pha rol tu byin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de ga na sems can
126a5('bum): snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'gong ngo // ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
126a6('bum): gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ci snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skal zhing gzhog go 'god
126a7('bum): do// ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi
126b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drag po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas bla na
126b2('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar tu pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
126b3('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa
126b4('bum): de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig
126b5('bum): rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag
