285a3('bum): rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu rnang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin cen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
285a4('bum): dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thar
285a5('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs
285a6('bum): pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa'i ting
285a7('bum): nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan/
285b1('bum): thams cad kyi chos su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod
285b2('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i tingata nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yod
285b3('bum): su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
285b4('bum): rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'dor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i bzhi thams cad khong
285b5('bum): du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan
285b6('bum): nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsnga
285b7('bum): thams cad mngon par dga' ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log
286a1('bum): @pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun pa
286a2('bum): dang 'gag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
286a3('bum): dang / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'ja
286a4('bum): dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas
286a5('bum): pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag pa gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing
286a6('bum): sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
286a7('bum): nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o//
286b1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong
286b2('bum): ba nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
286b3('bum): pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
286b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo blo da de/ 'di ni byang chub
286b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran
286b6('bum): ba nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
286b7('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / chad med bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
287a1('bum): / 'jug pa dang / rnam par pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par mthar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
287a2('bum): med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig
287a3('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
287a4('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur
287a5('bum): ro// zhes smras pa ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzungs kyi khams dang / gzungs med pa'i
287a6('bum): khams te/ rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba
287a7('bum): bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni// theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten/
287b1('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par btags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la zer
287b2('bum): bla ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin
287b3('bum): no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin ma nor pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du
287b4('bum): rtag cing gartan la zer zug mi 'gyur ba chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
287b5('bum): cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzugs kyi khams de rnam par btags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi rten la zer zug ma
287b6('bum): yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ 'byung ba yin no// ra
287b7('bum): 'byor gal te gzugs med pa'i khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste ci lta bzhin tu rtag cing
288a1('bum): brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni// theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
288a2('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i khams de rnam par rtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther
288a3('bum): zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/
288a4('bum): rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtsa
288a5('bum): la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur
288a6('bum): te/ rab 'byor gzugs de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can de dngos po med
288a7('bum): pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te tshor ba de bzhin ma nor
288b1('bum): pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos
288b2('bum): bo zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor tshor ba de rnam par
288b3('bum): brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /
288b4('bum): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'dus shes de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/
288b5('bum): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang
288b6('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'du shes de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su
288b7('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
289a1('bum): / bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'du byed de bzhin ma nor pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa
289a2('bum): de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni//
289a3('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'du byed de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa/
289a4('bum): yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas/
289a5('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal rta rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden
289a6('bum): ba yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
289a7('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan ci 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag
289b1('bum): cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
289b2('bum): te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mig de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag
289b3('bum): cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
289b4('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mig de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/
289b5('bum): dngos po med pa de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rna ba de bzhin ma nor ba de
289b6('bum): bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po
289b7('bum): zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zal gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rna ba de rnam par
290a1('bum): / brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med
290a2('bum): pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan
290a3('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/
290a4('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sna de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yod
290a5('bum): su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi rten la/ ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
290a6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lce de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa
290a7('bum): ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
290b1('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lce de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin
290b2('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal
290b3('bum): te lu su de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la theg zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos
290b4('bum): can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/
290b5('bum): lus de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos med pas/ de'i phyir
290b6('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te yid de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma mni pa
290b7('bum): te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg
291a1('bum): / pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yid
291a2('bum): de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur pa'i chos can te dngos po med pas/
291a3('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin ma
291a4('bum): nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos
291a5('bum): can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byer
291a6('bum): gzugs de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can de dngos po
291a7('bum): med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sgra re//
291b1('bum): bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther thug ma yin 'gyur ba'i
291b2('bum): chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba mi 'gyur te/ rab
291b3('bum): 'byor sgra de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/
291b4('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dri de bzhin
291b5('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur
291b6('bum): ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi
291b7('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dri rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos
292a1('bum): can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung
292a2('bum): ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te ro de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin
292a3('bum): du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
292a4('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor ro de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing brtan la zer zug
292a5('bum): ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba
292a6('bum): yin no// rab 'byor gal te reg de bzhin ma nor pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byin cing log ma yin pa bden pa yang dag ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du
292a7('bum): rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
292b1('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor reg de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la zer
292b2('bum): zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te
292b3('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te chos de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba
292b4('bum): bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
292b5('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi
292b6('bum): brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
292b7('bum): nan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mig gi rnam par bla de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa
293a1('bum): yang dag ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang
293a2('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs
293a3('bum): su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
293a4('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rno ba'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma
293a5('bum): yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha
293a6('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrub
293a7('bum): pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan pa ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
293b1('bum): rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin pa bden pa
293b2('bum): yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
293b3('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi
293b4('bum): rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zi'i gyis mnan
293b5('bum): te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta
293b6('bum): bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
293b7('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi rtan la
294a1('bum): ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
294a2('bum): 'jig brten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci
294a3('bum): log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha
294a4('bum): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa
294a5('bum): yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brten pa ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
294a6('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor po de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin
294a7('bum): ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha
294b1('bum): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par
294b2('bum): bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma
294b3('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma
294b4('bum): yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi
294b5('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed
294b6('bum): ba yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi
294b7('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma
295a1('bum): yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i
295a2('bum): chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
295a3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med
295a4('bum): bas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa de
295a5('bum): bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur
295a6('bum): ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhag yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab
295b1('bum): 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po
295b2('bum): med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lce'i 'dus te
295b3('bum): reg pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi
295b4('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
295b5('bum): rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/
295b6('bum): dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lus kyi
295b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing ba
296a1('bum): la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
296a2('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la
296a3('bum): ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/
296a4('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin ma nor pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa
296a5('bum): yong dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang
296a6('bum): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par
296a7('bum): brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir
296b1('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mig gi 'dus te reg
296b2('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug
296b3('bum): mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
296b4('bum): rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin pa gyur pa'i
296b5('bum): chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rna
296b6('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag
296b7('bum): cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
297a1('bum): / cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su
297a2('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
297a3('bum): pi'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sna'i 'dus te reg po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
297a4('bum): te/ phyin cing log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg
297a5('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
297a6('bum): de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa
297a7('bum): chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de
297b1('bum): bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos
297b2('bum): bo zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te/
297b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa de yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can de dngos po
297b4('bum): med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan to 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
297b5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin ma nor ba bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi
297b6('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur
297b7('bum): te/ rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug
298a1('bum): ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
298a2('bum): zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bde
298a3('bum): pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
298a4('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yod
298a5('bum): su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
298a6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sa'i khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi ci log ma
298a7('bum): yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang
298b1('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su
298b2('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan kha ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
298b3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te chu'i khams de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byin ci log ma yin la bden pa
298b4('bum): yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin tu rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma
298b5('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chu'i khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs
298b6('bum): pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
298b7('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te me'i khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log
299a1('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni//
299a2('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor me'i khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam
299a3('bum): par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma
299a4('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rlung gi khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin
299a5('bum): ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
299a6('bum): kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rlung gi khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed
299a7('bum): pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma
299b1('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te nam mkha'i khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/
299b2('bum): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
299b3('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par
299b4('bum): bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can de dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang
299b5('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin
299b6('bum): pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg
299b7('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas/ 'jig zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams de rnam par brtags
300a1('bum): pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas// de'i phyir
300a2('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te ma rig pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de
300a3('bum): bzhin te// phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni// theg pa
300a4('bum): chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor ma rig pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam pa
300a5('bum): bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha
300a6('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'du byed de bzhin ma nor pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log
300a7('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang
300b1('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'du byed rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su
300b2('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
300b3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin cing log ma yin la bden
300b4('bum): pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma
300b5('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa
300b6('bum): ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin pa'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
300b7('bum): zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te ming dang gzugs de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin cing log ma yin la
301a1('bum): / bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa
301a2('bum): chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor ming dang gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/
301a3('bum): rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis
301a4('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te skye mched drug de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin
301a5('bum): pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na
301a6('bum): ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor skye mched dug de rnam par brtags
301a7('bum): pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha/
301b1('bum): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te reg pa de bzhin ma nor pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/
301b2('bum): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang
301b3('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor reg pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su
301b4('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
301b5('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te tshor ba de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden
301b6('bum): pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
301b7('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing
302a1('bum): mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can de dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
302a2('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sred pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang
302a3('bum): dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
302a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi sgra mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sred pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther
302a5('bum): zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin
302a6('bum): no// rab 'byor gal te len pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan
302a7('bum): la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar
302b1('bum): mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor len pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan pa ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po
302b2('bum): med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te srid pa de bzhin ma
302b3('bum): nor pa'i de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi
302b4('bum): dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor srid
302b5('bum): pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par skyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir
302b6('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te skye ba de bzhin ma nor pa de bzhin
302b7('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po
303a1('bum): cig yinan no// theg pa chen po 'das kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar
303a2('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor skye ba de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can de
303a3('bum): dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir thag pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rga shi
303a4('bum): de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin pa bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur
303a5('bum): ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
303a6('bum): rab 'byor rga shi de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po
303a7('bum): med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//
303b1('bum): bam po bcu drug/ rab 'byor gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos
303b2('bum): bo med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha
303b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin
303b4('bum): no// rab 'byor gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lham
303b5('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir
303b6('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod
303b7('bum): pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab
304a1('bum): 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
304a2('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg
304a3('bum): ba chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po
304a4('bum): med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal
304a5('bum): te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
304a6('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis
304a7('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig
304b1('bum): yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab
304b2('bum): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
304b3('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
304b4('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen
304b5('bum): po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
304b6('bum): 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid dngos po med pa la dngos po ma
304b7('bum): yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te phyinapa
304b8('bum): byi stong ba zhid dngos po yod pa zhig
305a1('bum): bya bya// stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
305a2('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dris lha dang mi dang lha ma
305a3('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma
305a4('bum): yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong
305a5('bum): pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// /
305a6('bum): rab 'byor gal te chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
305a7('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha/
305b1('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po
305b2('bum): med pas yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab
305b3('bum): 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
305b4('bum): mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
305b5('bum): kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po med la
305b6('bum): dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor
305b7('bum): gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
306a1('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma
306a2('bum): yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mtha' las 'das
306a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhing yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
306a4('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
306a5('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa
306a6('bum): ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor thog ma dang the ma
306a7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
306b1('bum): ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang
306b2('bum): lha ma yin du bcas 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i
306b3('bum): phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos
306b4('bum): po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar
306b5('bum): mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
306b6('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg
306b7('bum): ba chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos
307a1('bum): po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
307a2('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang
307a3('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i
307a4('bum): phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
307a5('bum): dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar
307a6('bum): mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
307a7('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg
307b1('bum): ba chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin
307b2('bum): pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig
307b3('bum): yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bo
307b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin
307b5('bum): no// rab 'byor gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lham
307b6('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po
307b7('bum): 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig
308a1('bum): yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
308a2('bum): bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
308a3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar yin no// rab 'byor gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni//
308a4('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams
308a5('bum): dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab
308a6('bum): 'byor gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
308a7('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin/
308b1('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dbang po rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni//
308b2('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dbang po rnams dngos po med la dngos po
308b3('bum): ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te stobs rnams dngos
308b4('bum): po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi
308b5('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor stobs rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
308b6('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg
308b7('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos
309a1('bum): / po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
309a2('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lam dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
309a3('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lam dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
309a4('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma/
309a5('bum): yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i
309a6('bum): bden pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba
309a7('bum): yin no// rab 'byor gal te bsam gtan rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
309b1('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po
309b2('bum): 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te tshad med pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po
309b3('bum): med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams
309b4('bum): dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
309b5('bum): rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan 'byung
309b6('bum): ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
309b7('bum): kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i sgom par 'jug pa rnams dngos po med
310a1('bum): la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba
310a2('bum): yin no// rab 'byor gal te rnam par thar pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
310a3('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang
310a4('bum): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yod pa
310a5('bum): zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab
310a6('bum): 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po med la dngas pa mad dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang me dang lha ma yin
310a7('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dngos po
310b1('bum): yod pa zhig yin te dngos po ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab
310b2('bum): 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
310b3('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
310b4('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dngon par shes pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin
310b5('bum): pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams dngos
310b6('bum): po yod zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
310b7('bum): rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams dngos po med la dngos pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
311a1('bum): cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
311a2('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas
311a3('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
311a4('bum): dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur
311a5('bum): te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dngos po medo la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
311a6('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te mi 'jigs rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang sku
311a7('bum): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg
311b1('bum): pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dngos po
311b2('bum): yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
311b3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnam
311b4('bum): cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te snying rje chen po dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
311b5('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor snying rje chen po dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang
311b6('bum): mi dang lha ma yid du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod pa zhig
311b7('bum): yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
312a1('bum): bya bya// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi
312a2('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi sa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin
312a3('bum): na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rigs kyi sa'i chos dngos
312a4('bum): po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i
312a5('bum): sa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du ba'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
312a6('bum): rab 'byor brgyad pa'i sa'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
312a7('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
312b1('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po
312b2('bum): 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin
312b3('bum): te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
312b4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
312b5('bum): cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi
312b6('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir
312b7('bum): theg pa che na po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dgra bcom pa'i chos dngos po
313a1('bum): yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
313a2('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa'i chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po
313a3('bum): 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/
313a4('bum): dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab
313a5('bum): 'byor rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
313a6('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/
313a7('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i chos
313b1('bum): dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor
313b2('bum): gal te sangs rgyas kyis chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
313b3('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma
313b4('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin
313b5('bum): na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cinga'abyung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos kyi
313b6('bum): dbyings dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin
313b7('bum): no// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin/
314a1('bum): bya// du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid dngos po med la dngos po
314a2('bum): ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// 'byor gal te yang dag pa'i
314a3('bum): mtha' dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar
314a4('bum): mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
314a5('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
314a6('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po med la
314a7('bum): dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te
314b1('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
314b2('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po
314b3('bum): 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po
314b4('bum): bskyed phyin chad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi bar tu sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag dngos po med ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lham
314b5('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin chad snying po
314b6('bum): byang chub tu 'dug gi bar tu sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas 'jig rten
314b7('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos
315a1('bum): po med pa ma yin na na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
315a2('bum): bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
315a3('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin
315a4('bum): te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par khong du
315a5('bum): chud cing rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang mi 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
315a6('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bos bag
315a7('bum): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par khong du chud de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
315b1('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab glal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dngos po yod pa zhig yin te
315b2('bum): dngos po ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
315b3('bum): cing gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lham mer mi 'gyur lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhung nger mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
315b4('bum): rgyas kyi mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/
315b5('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur pa yin no// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin
315b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
315b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par mi mdzad de/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
316a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po med de/ dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
316a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis rgyas par 'gyengs pa mdzad do// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs
316a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug bcu dang ldan pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin
316a4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis go bar yang mi mdzad de/ rab
316a5('bum): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug bcu dang ldan pa dngos po med la dngos po ma ma yin pas/
316a6('bum): de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis ko/
316a7('bum): bar mdzad do// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo dngos po yod pa zhag yin te dngos po
316b1('bum): med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyis 'khor lo dge sbyong dam bram ze 'am lce 'am bdud dam tshangs pa
316b2('bum): 'am sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du chos dang ldan par skor bar mi nus pa skor bar yang mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
316b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po med de dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
316b4('bum): kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong 'am bram ze 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa rab tu bskor ro// rab 'byor/
316b5('bum): gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po yod
316b6('bum): pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ sems can de dag phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das par yang mi 'gyur
316b7('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po
317a1('bum): med de dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir sems can de rnams phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das
317a2('bum): so// yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la ni/ shar phyogs dmigs su med do//
317a3('bum): lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / bla dang 'og dang phyogs mtshams dmigs su med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang shar phyogs
317a4('bum): dmigs su med do// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / bla dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams dmigs su med do// de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam
317a5('bum): mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni ring po ma yin thung du ma yin zlum po ma yin gru bzhi ma yin mnyam pa ma yin mi mnyam
317a6('bum): pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang ring po ma yin/ thung du ma yin zlum po ma yin/ gru bzhi ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin mi mnyam pa
317a7('bum): ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni sngon po ma yin ser po ma yin dmar po ma yin//
317b1('bum): dkar po ma yin/ leb rgan ma yin shel dang rdul gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang sngon po yang ma yin ser po yang ma yin/ ra
317b2('bum): ma yin dmar po ma yin leng rgan ma yin/ shel dang rdul gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
317b3('bum): ste dper na nam mkha' ni 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma
317b4('bum): da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la ni 'grib pa med do// 'phel ba med do// /
