394a5('bum): zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo
394a6('bum): ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci
394a7('bum): bya zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi ma par mi dmigs/ na pos ni dri ma'i mthar
394b1('bum): mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ phan thos ni dus gsum pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ semams can dmigs/
394b2('bum): su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar
394b3('bum): byung bar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gan
394b4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar byung bar mi
394b5('bum): dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab
394b6('bum): 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar
394b7('bum): byung bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum bya nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
395a1('bum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dus gsum/
395a2('bum): la bsrabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po
395a3('bum): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
395a4('bum): zil gyis mnan te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to//
395a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces
395a6('bum): bgyi ba 'di legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ste/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing / 'das pa'i byang chub sems
395a7('bum): dpang sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid theb po// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
395b1('bum): dpang chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
395b2('bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med/ grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma mchis
395b3('bum): pa rnams kyang / theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bsrabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ dus gsum
395b4('bum): mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
395b5('bum): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing / 'das
395b6('bum): pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
395b7('bum): pa nyid brnyes par gyur to// brnyes so// brnyes par 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//
396a1('bum): / bam po nyi shu'o// / de nas byams gang gi bus bcom ldan 'das la
396a2('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas gtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes
396a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsgo ba mdzad pas/ 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
396a4('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gam gcig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po gtan par ma gyur lags gang /
396a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa'ang med de/ rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po bston
396a6('bum): to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems
396a7('bum): dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad bang shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khong du chud do// rab 'byor kyis gso la ga/
396b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs
396b2('bum): rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa
396b3('bum): nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
396b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa dang / bsam
396b5('bum): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
396b6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
396b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
397a1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
397a2('bum): thog ma dang za ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
397a3('bum): nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin
397a4('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
397a5('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang /
397a6('bum): rtag tu gtang snyoms kyis rnam par spyod pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni dag pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing / khongs
397a7('bum): su chud par 'dong ste/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos so// rab 'byor de la theg
397b1('bum): bas matan gyi pha rol tu phyin pad+ma/
397b2('bum): pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang
397b3('bum): yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes
397b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / mag gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa
397b5('bum): dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par
397b6('bum): shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg 'dus te rag pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri
397b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gA'i dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / kwa'i 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lci gang yin pa
397b8('bum): dang ra gang yin pa dang / sgo'i rnam par shes pa gang zin pa dang / lha'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus
398a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus
398a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus
398a3('bum): te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang
398a4('bum): yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sred pa gang yin pa dang / len
398a5('bum): ba gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
398a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin
398a7('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
398b1('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'das byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas
398b2('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa
398b3('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong
398b4('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
398b5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin
398b6('bum): pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i
398b7('bum): bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang
399a1('bum): yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gang yin pa dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang yin pa dang / rgyas pa'i/
399a2('bum): skye mched bcu gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / sdug bsngal
399a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
399a4('bum): dang / smon pa med pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang /
399a5('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
399a6('bum): bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / dge ba'i
399a7('bum): chos gang yin pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa dang bcas nga'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten
399b1('bum): pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dres byas kyi gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
399b2('bum): gshegs pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
399b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin
399b4('bum): pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs med par bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med
399b5('bum): bar mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor rnams grangs 'dis na/ khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po ston to// de ci
399b6('bum): phyir zhe na/ theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
399b7('bum): pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po 'ong gzhan la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa
400a1('bum): chen po dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
400a2('bum): tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po de
400a3('bum): 'ang gzhan la 'azod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de// de ltar na theg pa chen po dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
400a4('bum): med do// theg pa chen po de'ang gzhan la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
400a5('bum): yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po de'ang sbyin
400a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su bur med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de sbyar na theg pa chen
400a7('bum): po dang nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa
400b1('bum): chen po dang bye stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la byin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na reg ba
400b2('bum): chen po dang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar sred do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar
400b3('bum): na theg pa chen po dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba
400b4('bum): med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
400b5('bum): zhes bya ba med de// de ltar na theg pa chen po dang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la 'dus
400b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa
400b7('bum): chen po'ang gzhan la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su
401a1('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar/
401a2('bum): na theg pa chen po dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
401a3('bum): kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po 'ang
401a4('bum): gzhan la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med
401a5('bum): do// theg pa chen po'ang bzhan la rang gzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de de ltar na theg pa chen po dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med
401a6('bum): de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen 'ang gzhan la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang chos thams cad
401a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na
401b1('bum): theg pa chen po dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
401b2('bum): gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan
401b3('bum): la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su
401b4('bum): byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
401b5('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar
401b6('bum): na theg pa chen po dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la dran pa nye ba
401b7('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po deng dran pa nye bar gzhog pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
402a1('bum): theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /
402a2('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/
402a3('bum): ltar na theg pa chen po dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la dbang po rnams kyang gzhan zhes
402a4('bum): bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang dbang po rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la stobs rnams kyang gzhan
402a5('bum): zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang stobs rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la byang chub kyi yan lag
402a6('bum): rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyisu byar med do// theg pa chen po 'ang
402a7('bum): gzhan la 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gnyis su med
402b1('bum): de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang 'phags pa'i
402b2('bum): bden pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na
402b3('bum): theg pa chen po dang bsam gtan rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya
402b4('bum): ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang tshad med pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la gzugs med pa'i
402b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de
402b6('bum): gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang
402b7('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgoms par 'jug pa dag yang gzhan zhes bya ba med do// de ltar na
403a1('bum): theg pa chen po dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po/
403a2('bum): 'ang gzhan la rnam par mthar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang rnam par thar
403a3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la mngon par shes pa rnams
403a4('bum): kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang mngon par shes pa rnams kyang garAni su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po 'ang gzhan la
403a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen
403a6('bum): po'ang gzhan la gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
403a7('bum): theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
403b1('bum): rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang mi 'jig
403b2('bum): pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na
403b3('bum): theg pa chen po dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la snying rje chen po'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/
403b4('bum): de ltar na theg chen po dang snying rje chen po'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang
403b5('bum): gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// rab 'byor nas
403b6('bum): grangs des na theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par
403b7('bum): 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni
404a1('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// byang snyems dpan gyi ma'i mthang mi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su mi dmigs te/
404a2('bum): gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems
404a3('bum): dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// 'du
404a4('bum): byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas rlig par bgyi'o// rnams par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub
404a5('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste/ gzugs byang chub sems depa'o zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs so// tshor ba byang
404a6('bum): chub sems dpa' shes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs so// 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi
404a7('bum): dmigs so// 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa
404b1('bum): ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnams pa thams cad du thams cad yang
404b2('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ ma dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par
404b3('bum): bgyi byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang rim gyis yang dag par ma mthong ma dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la
404b4('bum): gdams shing bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi
404b5('bum): ba yang bdag la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyi ba yang / byang chub sems dpa'
404b6('bum): la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// de ltar na rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs lta'ang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par
404b7('bum): ma grub pa'i tshor ba lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par ma grub pa'i 'du shes lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par ma grub pa'i 'du byed lta'ang gang zhig mchis/
405a1('bum): gang mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa ste'ang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags/
405a2('bum): gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags/ gang mngon
405a3('bum): bar ma grub pa de ni rnams par shes pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pa mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur/
405a4('bum): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis na/ mngon par ma grub pa mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams
405a5('bum): su mchis sam/ gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dzum yongs su mi 'dzum/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing
405a6('bum): yid mi 'jigs/ mi skrag sdang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
405a7('bum): sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar
405b1('bum): dmigs su med pa yin/ phyi ma'i mthar dmigs su med pa yin/ dbus su dmigs su med pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ gzugs kun//
405b2('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas ra par rig par bya ba yin/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems/
405b3('bum): dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba
405b4('bum): yin/ 'du byed kun tu mtha' bla'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang
405b5('bum): chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang /
405b6('bum): med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes
405b7('bum): bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yini/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ rnam par shes pa byang chub
406a1('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du de ltar byang chub sem
406a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
406a3('bum): zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smras/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du byang chub sems kyang ril
406a4('bum): kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing
406a5('bum): rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni
406a6('bum): ming tsam du bas so zhes bgyi na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du ci ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi/ yang bdag gi mngon par ma grub pa ma mchis
406a7('bum): sod/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis//
406b1('bum): de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la gzugs mngon par grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis/ tshor ba mngon par grub pa lta'ang gang //
406b2('bum): zhig mchis/ 'dus shes mngon par grub pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ 'du byed mngon pa grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis/ rnam par shes mngon
406b3('bum): par grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis te/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lags
406b4('bum): so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub
406b5('bum): pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma gru ba zhig mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha
406b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi 'am zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub las gud na'ang byang chub sems
406b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de yang dmigs su ma mchis so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub
407a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dzum yongs su mi 'dzum/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing yid mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par/
407a2('bum): mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab
407a3('bum): 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
407a4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
407a5('bum): mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sems can stong pa dang /
407a6('bum): sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can med
407a7('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
407b1('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir na/ sems can med pa dang / sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems
407b2('bum): can rang bzhin med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dbus mi dmigs so// sems can med pa'ang gzhan/ sems can stong
407b3('bum): pa 'ang gzhan/ sems can dben pa 'ang gzhan/ sems can rang bzhin med pa'ang gzhan zhig la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan zhig ste/ sngon gyi mtha'
407b4('bum): 'ang gzhan/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan/ dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sems can med pa gang yin pa dang
407b5('bum): sems can stong pa gang yin pa dang / sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
407b6('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
407b7('bum): dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzugs med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi/
408a1('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
408a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyin
408a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i
408a4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dbus su mi dmigs so// gzugs stong pa'i phyir byang chub
408a5('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sem
408a6('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs med pa dang / gzugs stong pa dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo/
408a7('bum): kying med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ gzugs med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang
408b1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ gzugs dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang
408b2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// rje dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na gzugs med pa gang yin pa dang / gzug
408b3('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
408b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
408b5('bum): tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tsho ba
408b6('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/
408b7('bum): tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
409a1('bum): tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
409a2('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
409a3('bum): su mi dmigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
409a4('bum): mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba med pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / tshor ba dben pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la
409a5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so// phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ char pa stong pa'ang gzhan ma
409a6('bum): tshor ba stong pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan
409a7('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na tshor
409b1('bum): bamed pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'thar ba byed med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'/
409b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbas gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de
409b3('bum): gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi
409b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so// 'du shes ngo bo zhin
409b5('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes
409b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du
409b7('bum): shes ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
410a1('bum): @'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
410a2('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha rA dwa ti'i
410a3('bum): bu 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes dben pa dang / 'du shes ngobo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi ma'i mtha'
410a4('bum): mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 'du shes med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/
410a5('bum): 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/
410a6('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du shes med pa gang yin pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du shes dben pa
410a7('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / 'du shes ngo za nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mthan
410b1('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub
410b2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'a byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang
410b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed med pa'i
410b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben
410b5('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid sde'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed med
410b6('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i
410b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
411a1('bum): / dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed med pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mthar
411a2('bum): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 'du byed med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// 'du byed dben
411a3('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
411a4('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed med pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
411a5('bum): 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
411a6('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa med
411a7('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
411b1('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
411b2('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
411b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par
411b4('bum): shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
411b5('bum): mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
411b6('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
411b7('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa
412a1('bum): bya/ la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par
412a2('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa
412a3('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mapa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam
412a4('bum): par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang
412a5('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
412a6('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig stong pa
412a7('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig ngo bo nyid
412b1('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// mig stong pa nyid kyi
412b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig ngo bo nyid med
412b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig stong pa nyid kyi
412b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig ngo bo nyid med pa'i
412b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig med pa dang / mig stong pa nyid dang / mig dben pa dang /
412b6('bum): mig ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mthara' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ mig med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mig stong pa
412b7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mig dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mig ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
412'a1('bum): gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
412'a2('bum): de ltar na mig med pa gang yin dang / mig stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / mig dben pa gang yin pa dang / mig ngo bo nyid med pa'ang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
412'a3('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
412'a4('bum): med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
412'a5('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
412'a6('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phye ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
412'a7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
412'b1('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpar
412'b2('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
412'b3('bum): su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba med pa dang / rna ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dben pa dang / rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa la
412'b4('bum): sngon gyi mthara' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rna ba med pa dang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
412'b5('bum): ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
412'b6('bum): mtha' gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rna ba med pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
412'b7('bum): rna ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
413a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna
413a2('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpe'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna dben
413a3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna med pa'i phyir byang
413a4('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sem
413a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna ngo ba nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi mthar mi dmigs so// sna med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
413a6('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
413a7('bum): mi dmigs so// sna ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna med pa dang /
413b1('bum): sna stong pa nyid dang / sna dben pa dang / sna ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sna med pa
413b2('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
413b3('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
413b4('bum): de ltar na sna med pa gang yin pa dang / sna stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
413b5('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de
413b6('bum): gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so// lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir
413b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so// lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems sa dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lce ngo bo nyid med
414a1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lce med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// /
414a2('bum): lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce
414a3('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lce stong pa nyid
414a4('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lce ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
414a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce med pa dang / lce stong pa nyid dang / lce dben pa dang /
414a6('bum): lce ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lce med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce stong pa nyid kyang
414a7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ lce dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lde ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang
414b1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthar 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce med pa gang yin pa dang /
414b2('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lde dben pa gang yin pa dang / lde ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
414b3('bum): pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thamams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
414b4('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
414b5('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyis mthar mi dmigs so// lus med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang
414b6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' med phyi ma'i
414b7('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// lus ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lus med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
415a1('bum): dmigs so// lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
415a2('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lus ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
415a3('bum): lus med pa dang / lus stong pa nyid dang / lus dben pa dang / lus ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs
415a4('bum): te/ lus med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus ngo bo nyid med pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang
415a5('bum): chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha
415a6('bum): dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus med pa gang yin pa dang / lus stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
415a7('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
415b1('bum): med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
415b2('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// yid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// yid
415b3('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
415b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// yid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so//
415b5('bum): yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// yid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
415b6('bum): sem dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid med pa dang / yid stong pa nyid dang / yid dben pa dang / yid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
415b7('bum): mi dmigs// phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmig/ dbus mi dmig te/ yid med pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid dben pa dang gzhan ma yin/ yid ngo bo
416a1('bum): nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
416a2('bum): mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ khyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
416a3('bum): bu/ de ltar na/ yid med pa gang yin pa dang / yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid do
416a4('bum): nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
416a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// /
416a6('bum): dge'o//
416a7('bum): shub+haM/
